meanings.definition: A preview or advance showing of a performance or event.
meanings.sent1: We got a prevue of the new movie before it was released.
meanings.sent2: The prevue of the concert got us excited for the main event.
meanings.sent3: The prevue of the play made us eager to see the full performance.
meanings.sent4: The prevue of the fashion show was like a sneak peek into the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: Attending the prevue of the art exhibition gave us a taste of what was to come.
